title: Tempo: Australia in the 70's [Greek version]
creator_credit: Keith Gow, Roland Beckett and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Gives impressions of life and industry in Australia at the beginning of the 1970’s, with emphasis on future growth and development. Peter Weir co-wrote the script with Keith Gow and Martin Von Borneman was the Director of Photography. Animation by Yoram Gross. This version is dubbed in Greek.
